author: amassari
msg: When the xsi:type attribute is present, don't emit validation errors complaining of a missing declaration (XERCESC-1481)

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2002 : Update to DMSLT.testQueueRecoveryCountEmpty which reuses a previous test for validation. However, it did not stop the active broker before running that test so the DerbyMS threw an exception preventing startup and so testing."

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2002 : Fixed issue where the BLT.defaultLog4j test failed to startup.

Cause is that the broker.ready 'BRK-1004' message goes to qpid.log not standard out. Updating the broker.start string to be a value that is always logged to standard out will ensure we know when the test is ready
